changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE order_items ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, product_id INTEGER NOT NULL, size_id INTEGER, amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, quantity INTEGER NOT NULL, order_id INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (size_id) REFERENCES size(id) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE)
